This directory contains a modified implementation of inst2vec.

The inst2vec source code is from the "Neural Code Comprehension"
repository, available at:

    URL: https://github.com/spcl/ncc
    Commit: 6eb87486a42708d730da212d42d52a0c4690cd5e
    License: BSD 3-Clause License

The methodology is described in this paper:

     @incollection{ncc,
        title = {Neural Code Comprehension: A Learnable Representation of Code Semantics},
        author = {Ben-Nun, Tal and Jakobovits, Alice Shoshana and Hoefler, Torsten},
        booktitle = {Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 31},
        editor = {S. Bengio and H. Wallach and H. Larochelle and K. Grauman and N. Cesa-Bianchi and R. Garnett},
        pages = {3588--3600},
        year = {2018},
        publisher = {Curran Associates, Inc.},
        url = {http://papers.nips.cc/paper/7617-neural-code-comprehension-a-learnable-representation-of-code-semantics.pdf}
    }
